posts.post_content:
Posted By: Herb Lim
I have the following for sale:

1911 T212 Obak Buck Weaver Red Back SGC 40 - $4,000.

The card has a stamped back and looks like it is in EX-MT condition. There is a very, very slight wrinkle in the lower right corner that cannot be seen unless held under light at a specific angle.

Please see scans. If interested, please email me at herbwlim@verizon.net. First person to say "I'll take it", gets the card.

Checks and money orders accepted. Paypal is ok, but please add 3%.

Thanks,
Herb
